sys_element_mapping.value: cmdb_ci={{0c3776d4-5780-4182-8f3b-19bbba94f29c.Record}}^short_description={{subflow.monitor_sys_id.source}} has multiple negative monitor records.﻿^description={{subflow.monitor_sys_id.source}} negative monitor records have exceeded the threshold for the last 30 days.
